title: Hour 2 - Mark Grace (06-16-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Mark Grace (06-16-20)
description:
Mark Grace tell Dan that he had 3 big memories from the 1998 Cubs season. Mark said it was Sosa and McGwire home run race and emergence of Kerry Wood as a rookie along with the Cubs in the post season race.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
